Text:
Thanks for the upload, but these Sandman issues are already here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6240757/Sandman_
The comics may be already here, But some people look for individual issues. Some may be unreadable etc. But I am glad you are happy for the upload.
We need high quality scans of The Sandman. These scans are old and low quality. A series of this nature deserves top quality.
